segments.text: Professor , do you have a few moments when I could meet with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I schedule my appointments from two to four on Saturday ; what works best for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Three would be a good time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great , do you need directions to my office ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , just make sure to go through the double doors , and I'll be on the right .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will enjoy seeing you ; have a good week !
segments.speaker: S2
